Articles.Content: I verified this is working in 1.3.1 and updated Space Dock page accordingly. No changes to mod.

This is a general notice to mods that include agencies--Squad changed how agency titles are detected in contracts (it's a simple line, *title =* rather than *name =* )

<iframe allowfullscreen="" data-controller="core.front.core.autosizeiframe" data-embedcontent="" data-embedid="embed8531530585" scrolling="no" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/167213-agency-names-missing-in-contracts/&do=embed&comment=3216924&embedComment=3216924&embedDo=findComment" style="height:267px;max-width:502px;"></iframe>

I found this out the hard way, or rather Bruno did, and I think your mod had that. You may want to correct it in future releases (it's very easy, literally just one additional line of code in the agents.cfg).

Thanks, I wasn't aware of this issue.
I've uploaded a version to spacedock with the fix for the PEBKAC Agency name missing from contracts. No other changes.
I love this mod so much, mainly because it has one for different size command pods and the stock one can't even decouple itself, where these ones can
Thanks for the compliment!  I learned a LOT while making these.

I verified this is working in 1.4.1 and updated Spacedock accordingly. I'm not playing KSP these days and am not sure when I will have a chance to check it against the new DLC. I did purchase it already, so if somebody runs into issues let me know and I will make some time to look into it.

The only "issue" I have with this mod, is that the New Mk1-3 Pod have the handrails in both sides of the ladder stick trough the BPC. same with the windows and Z clipping, other than that it works fine.
